item.title: DELPHIC ASP - An Answer Set Programming model of the DELPHIC semantics
item.description: An Answer Set Programming model of the DELPHIC semantics for DEL-based epistemic planning problems.

item.title: PLATO - ePistemic muLti-agent Answer seT programming sOlver
item.description: ePistemic muLti-agent Answer seT programming sOlver. Solver for epistemic planning problems based on the mA* language.
